title: 'Unexpected UFO spotted over supermarket' in Bracknell explained
description: A UFO sighting above a supermarket wasn’t what it seemed.

title: UFO intel documents stolen out of Russia reveal decade-long probes into alien encounters and abductions
description: The documents, first absconded from under the nose of the KGB in 1993 by legendary reporter George Knapp, have been the stuff of UFO-lore for thirty years and have finally been released.

title: Donald Trump 'Fully Briefed' on Alien Life as White House Orders Release of Secret UFO Evidence
description: Rep Eric Burlison says Trump supported a push to access secret UFO sites. The Pentagon maintains there is no verifiable evidence of alien technology.

title: Leaked Pentagon footage shows UFO making 'impossible' moves before going to warp speed
description: New video has been obtained from the Pentagon which appears to show a genuine UFO moving at speeds no human aircraft is capable of achieving.

title: Lara Trump Says She's Heard Her Father President Donald Trump Will Announce UFO News Soon
description: Lara Trump says she's heard President Trump may soon announce UFO news, fueling public intrigue and speculation about possible government disclosure of unidentified aerial phenomena.
